title: Morena Baccarin
summary: Morena Silva de Vaz Setta Baccarin[1] (Portuguese: [mo'ɾenɐ baka'ɾĩ]; born June 2, 1979)[2][3] is a Brazilian actress known for portraying Inara Serra in the sci-fi series Firefly and its follow-up film, Vanessa in the superhero comedy franchise Deadpool, Jessica Brody in the Showtime series Homeland and Dr. Leslie "Lee" Thompkins in the Fox series Gotham. For Homeland, she received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series in 2013.
